functions.name: Align
functions.desc: Map with BWA. Mapping low-divergent sequences against a large reference genome, such as the human genome and is designed for Illumina sequence reads up to 100bp.
functions.example: data = bwa.Align(ref, data, data2='', index='') #single-read. Give valid data2 value for pair-read.
functions.example2: data = bwa.Align(ref, data, data2='', index='', output='') #pair-read

params.name: data
params.comment: if folder, all .fastq/.fq files are recursively collected from that folder.

params.name: output
params.desc: folder if data is a folder; otherwise a .sam file.
